content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes with gun violence, blood and gore, and strong language.

name: Project Vesperi Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home
  • Processor: Intel i5 8400 2.80 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Project Vesperi is a branching narrative sci-fi game where you play as Dr. Evelyn Roth, sent to investigate a potential sign of life on Venus. When an intruder enters the station, Evelyn must make choices that impact the lives of everyone around her, and ultimately, humanity.
